item.title: The 7 Hours of Creation
item.description: Yes this title is a play on words, and yes you are going to see a lot more of them. It didn’t actually take 7 hours, but this is the process and steps I used for creating my website.

item.title: Lame is Cool
item.description: Clever titles for days. This walkthough of the Lame box is another begginner friendly entry level HTB. We'll explore a little anonymous FTP, and find out more about Samba. You can find the walkthrough video down below!

item.title: This is my Legacy
item.description: The clever titles just don't stop! This is my walkthrough of the Legacy HTB. Enjoy, find the video below, and reach out if you have any questions.
